meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181122-8786509_0143.12 ::date 2015-10-11T11:55:57 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt However, the way I see it is that by blaming the pundits i.e. "hate speech", rather than Jared Lee Loughner, we are taking away the focus on what it should be and that is that Mr. Loughner committed murder and quite frankly I believe he was mentally disturbed. # ::save-date Wed Oct 21, 2015 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181122-8786509_0143_12.txt
sentence: However, the way I see it is that by blaming the pundits i.e. "hate speech", rather than Jared Lee Loughner, we are taking away the focus on what it should be and that is that Mr. Loughner committed murder and quite frankly I believe he was mentally disturbed.
